summary: An Ordinance accepting a deed of conveyance from The House of the Good Shepherd, a corporation, to certain property in the North One Half (N 1/2) of the Southwest Quarter (S.W. 1/4) of the Southwest Quarter (S.W. 1/4) of Section Eight (8), Township Twenty-five (25) North, Range Four (4) East, W. M., and laying off public streets therein.
